files.description: Implements the atomic-claim schema with machine-readable fields (IDs, subject/predicate/object, qualifiers, timeframe, modality, normalization) and label definitions (supported/unsupported/insufficient).

files.description: Runs claim-level audits by retrieving evidence for each atomic claim, applying decision logic to assign supported/unsupported/insufficient, and emitting per-claim rationales and traces.

files.description: Contains example atomic claims with gold labels to demonstrate auditing and enable end-to-end evaluation of false-accept/abstain metrics.

missionDescription: Define an atomic-claim schema + labels (supported/unsupported/insufficient) and build a small curated reference corpus + retrieval layer to run claim-level audits and compute tiered false-accept/abstain metrics.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Establishes claim-level verification as the default handling for borderline-confidence queries, which is the core unit needed for risk-tier labeling, abstention metrics, and claim-aggregation decision...
